synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: previously reported crystal structure of Zn2(dobpdc) with Zn atoms replaced by Mn atoms
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Fourier difference maps revealed excess electron density above each Mn site, indicating the presence of mmen groups.

Maintained rigid bodies for mmen and dobpdc4– during the refinement process. Refined dihedral angles of mmen, position and orientation of mmen and dobpdc4– rigid bodies, rotation angle of the carboxylate, C−C bond distances in the dobpdc4– rigid body, and Mn atomic position.

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: previously reported crystal structure of Zn2(dobpdc) with Zn atoms replaced by Mn atoms, and evidence of ammonium carbamate formation upon CO2 adsorption
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Developed a rigid, idealized model for the ammonium carbamate moiety based on reported single crystal structure of methyl(2-(methylammonio)ethyl)-carbamate.

Maintained rigid bodies initially but independently refined all atomic positions in the final cycles of refinement. Assigned independent isotropic thermal parameters to each C, N, O, and Mn atom, except for dobpdc4– atoms.
